text: Which Python user interface library can I use for 2D games?
I want to create a 2D game on Python with heavy user interface: windows, buttons, text input, etc.
So far I've been using PyGame for a few simple games.
The game is a 2D MUD, with the standard rendering loop to draw stuff on the screen.
I need the user interface to interact with the game entities like sales, blacksmith, etc.
I am looking for something like a mix of Pygame and wxPython/pyQT/pyGTK.
